Uses of Package
com.tapjoy

Classes in com.tapjoy used by com.tapjoy
TapjoyAwardPointsNotifier
          Any class calling TapjoyConnect.awardTapPoints(int, TapjoyAwardPointsNotifier) should implement TapjoyAwardPointsNotifier so it can receive the callback containing the virtual currency name/total info.
TapjoyConnect
          Created by Tapjoy.
Copyright 2010 Tapjoy.com All rights reserved.

For information about SDK integration, best practices and FAQs, please go to http://kc.tapjoy.com
TapjoyConnectNotifier
          Any class calling TapjoyConnect.requestTapjoyConnect(android.content.Context, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.util.Hashtable, TapjoyConnectNotifier) should implement this class so it can receive the callback on whether the connect call is successful or not.
TapjoyDailyRewardAdNotifier
          Notifier class which sends callbacks whenever receiving Daily Reward data/response.
TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier
          Notifier class which sends callbacks whenever receiving Banner Ad data/response.
TapjoyEarnedPointsNotifier
          Notifier to inform the app whenever virtual currency has been earned.
TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier
          Deprecated. Use TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier instead.
Notifier class which sends callbacks whenever receiving Full Screen Ad data/response.
TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier
          Notifier class which sends callbacks whenever receiving a response to TapjoyConnect.getFullScreenAd(TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier).
TapjoyNotifier
          Any class calling TapjoyConnect.getTapPoints(TapjoyNotifier) should implement TapjoyNotifier so it can receive the callback containing the virtual currency name/total info.
TapjoySpendPointsNotifier
          Any class calling TapjoyConnect.spendTapPoints(int, TapjoySpendPointsNotifier) should implement TapjoySpendPointsNotifier so it can receive the callback containing the virtual currency name/total info.
TapjoyVideoNotifier
           
TapjoyViewNotifier
          Callback methods which get triggered whenever a Tapjoy view opens or closes.
See TapjoyViewType for the different view types.
